alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 10:48AM EST until January 29 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Otsego and Delaware counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will be elevation dependent with elevations above 1000 feet seeing the higher accumulations. Given the heavy and wet snow, there is the potential for isolated power outages. Elevations below 1000 feet will see lower end snow accumulations with temperatures above freezing. Most of the snow will accumulate this afternoon and tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
